info.name: Governance Audit Lab
info.summary: Experimental governance & audit lab for Nextcloud: file labels, filecache explorer, and hash-chained audit trails.
info.description:
Governance & Audit Lab is an experimental Nextcloud app for exploring governance and audit patterns. It provides three modules:
• Governance Playground – define and apply labels (e.g. Public, Internal, Confidential) to files and folders and enforce simple local rules such as blocking public shares for Confidential items. • Filecache Explorer – admin-only diagnostics for inspecting filecache entries, running scoped occ files:scan operations, and viewing before/after snapshots for debugging sync and indexing issues. • Audit Trail Sandbox – capture file-related events (create/delete/share/label changes) in an audit_events table with a simple hash chain, and provide an admin UI to filter events and verify basic chain integrity.
The app is intended as an internal sandbox for prototyping concepts that can later be reused in production-grade governance and compliance products.
info.author: Max Mirkia
